subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: By beating a rock-solid Oklahoma team, 62-58, in the Carrier Dome, Coach Tom Izzo brought the Spartans storming back to the round of 8 for a ninth time.
snippet: By beating a rock-solid Oklahoma team, 62-58, in the Carrier Dome, Coach Tom Izzo brought the Spartans storming back to the round of 8 for a ninth time.
